pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Example PackageThis is a simple example package. You can use[Github-flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/)to write your content.How to generate a PIP package?https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/tutorials/packaging-projects/change setup.cfg versionpy -m buildpy -m twine upload --skip-existing dist/*
